title: Tell Farukhabad
description: Settlement site in the Deh Luran Plain in Iran rich in pottery remains. The site has remains from the Chalcolithic, Uruk and Early Dynastic, Elamite, Parthian, and Sasanian periods.

properties.description: Approximate imagery location based on Google Earth representing Tell Farukhabad after Wright 1981.
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Tell Farukhabad
